ovdesc.p: This screen is used define the Risk filtering conditions for correspondent banks, country and currency wise.
The condition are based on the incoming message type, transaction currency and type of transaction - Credit Transfer or Bank Transfer
The conditions can be defined Credit or Debit or both sides of the transaction
The limits or conditions can be either Amount or Number of transactions
Allowed exposure by counterparty, country and currency can be deinfed by daily, weekly and monthly
Maximum transaction amount for a payment can also be defined here
Any payments that cross the limits will be moved to Risk Filter Queue with a status 624.
This screen store the details to PPT.RISKFILTERCONDITION table
